text: Frank Anthony Grillo (born June 8, 1965) is an American actor. He is known for playing Brock Rumlow / Crossbones in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), Sergeant Leo Barnes in The Purge franchise, and Rick Flag Sr. in the DC Universe (DCU). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American video game actors Category:American martial artists Category:Actors from New York City
title: Frank Grillo
